pages.text: Productive Bees builds on top of vanilla bee farming. Some understanding of the vanilla system is assumed in this guide.
First thing you need to find is a vanilla bee nest to get some honey bottles and honeycombs. The honey bottles are needed to craft Bee Cages which makes it muc easier to transport bees to your home..
Once you've collected enough honeycombs, build yourself an advanced beehive and an expansion box. The advanced beehive allows you to look inside and keep an eye on your bees and what they produce.

Next you will need to collect different bees to start breeding. In the overworld you have most likely seen a lot of different bees flying around, these are solitary bees and live in nests found around the world.

Solitary bees will not live in hives and do not produce anything, but are needed for breeding. Some bees can only be found in other dimensions. Use JEI to look up the breeding recipes so you know which bees you need to find. If the bees are not showing in JEI, run the /reload command.
